TopicTitle: 2 of my Kerbals lost all their levels

Articles.Content:
2 of my Kerbals lost all their levels, before both of them were at level 4, it happened after I sent them on EVA at Kerbin for a page of my graphic novel.

In the spoiler there are the stats of the Kerbals from the persistence file.

                flight = 5

Even though it says both of the Kerbals died they are still on the crew roster and they never turned into smoke.

Do you have any kind of life support mod installed? As far as i know the UCI-LS mod lets your kerbals lose all experience levels when they run out of supplies.

 

Regards

Tantalus

1 hour ago, Tantalus said:

Do you have any kind of life support mod installed? As far as i know the UCI-LS mod lets your kerbals lose all experience levels when they run out of supplies.

Nope, in the spoiler there is a picture of my mod list.

Spoiler

Compare the stats with them from a former savefile? I guess there might be missing a entry, but i really don`t know.
I had a similar issue once, but i couldn`t solve it...
